response: "Datenprivatsphäre ist wichtig! 🔒 Why do companies keep insisting on collecting our personal data? 🤷‍♂️ Don't they understand that we want to keep our information private? 🙅‍♀️ It's time for change! 💪 Let's demand better data protection laws and take back control of our digital lives! 🌟 #Datenschutz #Privatsphäre #DigitalRights"
